about_the_game:
STORY:

Platformer sequel to Music man game.
Player are again young man whose mission is collect all blue music notes at different levels. Then when all notes collected player can use Piano and open portal and finish levels. Game contain 4 different themed levels with different obstacles, like rotating objects, disappearing clouds, moving platforms etc
Levels contain flying enemy with missiles to avoid. Player can find notes at different place at levels and some notes are hidden at boxes and barrels which can open by hitting them. Also player need collect coins. Coins can be used to unlock different jumping and moving platforms. Coins are hidden at levels and different barrels. If player dies, Level restart from starting point. So can you find all hidden notes and play Piano

FEATURES:

- 4 different themed maps
- collect all music notes to finish level
- flying enemies with rockets
- Collect enough coins to unlock different platforms
- Jumping,moving platforms.
- Disappearing clouds
- Rotating objects
- Find blue Crystal every level to get steam achievements
- Collect hearts to increase health
- Box and barrels that contains coins and notes
- Piano and portal which can be used after all notes collected
detailed_description:
A CINEMATIC SPACE SHOOTER - WISHLIST NOW!



About the Game

STORY:

Platformer sequel to Music man game.
Player are again young man whose mission is collect all blue music notes at different levels. Then when all notes collected player can use Piano and open portal and finish levels. Game contain 4 different themed levels with different obstacles, like rotating objects, disappearing clouds, moving platforms etc
Levels contain flying enemy with missiles to avoid. Player can find notes at different place at levels and some notes are hidden at boxes and barrels which can open by hitting them. Also player need collect coins. Coins can be used to unlock different jumping and moving platforms. Coins are hidden at levels and different barrels. If player dies, Level restart from starting point. So can you find all hidden notes and play Piano

FEATURES:

- 4 different themed maps
- collect all music notes to finish level
- flying enemies with rockets
- Collect enough coins to unlock different platforms
- Jumping,moving platforms.
- Disappearing clouds

name: Music Man 2: New land

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: windows 8
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nvidia 1000 series
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct x9
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nvidia 2000 series
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct x9

short_description: Sequel to Music man game. Collect all notes at 4 different levels to play piano and find also mysterious blue crystals
